Posts.Content: sharon4495 wrote: I have just returned home from by steriotaxic (sp?) biopsy. The area biopsies was the upper right part of my right breast. My report said I had focal clusters of microcalcifications that were indeterminant. The clusters contained many microcalc's. I am 51, post menopausal with no hormone treatment. From doing some research I think I should be pretty worried...any advice? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Birad 4 both breasts... Two biopsies...worried and waiting sharon4495 LittleMelons
